description: Local wholesale & fulfillment management system for Azteka Foods

tasks.name: Bootstrap Project
tasks.prompt: Run npm install, verify dependencies, check for Docker and Prisma installations. If docker-compose.yml exists, run docker-compose up -d. Then detect free port (>=3002) and start the dev server with 'npm run dev -- --port <port>'. Report active URL and DB status.

tasks.name: Expand Prisma Schema
tasks.prompt: Open prisma/schema.prisma and add missing models: Order, Customer, Driver, Route, ClockIn, Inventory, Settings. Then run 'npx prisma generate' and 'npx prisma db push'. Verify new tables appear in Prisma Studio.

tasks.name: Import Products CSV
tasks.prompt: Run 'node scripts/import_csv_products.js' to import Products_Identifiers.csv into Product table. Confirm successful insertions using 'npx prisma studio'.

tasks.name: Link Product Images
tasks.prompt: Modify /admin/images to show products missing images. On drag-drop upload, save files under public/uploads and update product.imageUrl in DB. Test by uploading one image and checking via Prisma Studio.

tasks.name: Setup Print Service
tasks.prompt: Create folder /printer-service. Run 'npm init -y' then 'npm install express pdf-to-printer body-parser cors'. Build index.js with POST /print that receives order JSON, creates a PDF receipt, and sends it to default printer. Start it on port 4101 and test with sample order.

tasks.name: Expand Sales App
tasks.prompt: Add new pages in /app: /sales (catalog grid), /checkout (confirm order), /offline (queue unsent orders). Implement cart reducer and save orders to IndexedDB for offline mode. Test add-to-cart and checkout flow locally.

tasks.name: Build Admin Dashboard
tasks.prompt: Extend /admin with tabs: Orders, Inventory, Employees, Settings. Fetch data from /api/admin/* endpoints. Use shadcn/ui Tabs and Cards layout. Add filters by date, route, and driver.

tasks.name: Deploy to Hostinger VPS
tasks.prompt: SSH into VPS, install Node 22, Docker, PM2, and Nginx. Clone azteka-dsd repo. Run 'docker-compose up -d', 'npx prisma generate', 'npx prisma db push', and 'npm run build'. Start app via PM2 on port 4102. Configure Nginx reverse proxy to azteka.<yourdomain>.com â†’ localhost:4102.

tasks.name: Sync & GitHub Push
tasks.prompt: Ensure .gitignore excludes node_modules, .next, and .env. Commit all changes and push to GitHub. If large file errors occur, remove offending files and retry. Confirm repo shows clean commit.
